org.eel.kitchen.jsonschema.keyword

Class AbstractTypeKeywordValidator

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.eel.kitchen.jsonschema.keyword.KeywordValidator
      • org.eel.kitchen.jsonschema.keyword.AbstractTypeKeywordValidator
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    DisallowKeywordValidator, TypeKeywordValidator

    public abstract class AbstractTypeKeywordValidator
extends KeywordValidator
    Abstract validator for the type and disallow keywords

    The structure of these two keywords are the same, the only difference is the validation process.

      • addSimpleType

        private void addSimpleType(String type)
        Add a simple type to typeSet

        There are two special cases:

        • if type is ANY, all values are filled in;
        • if type is number, it also covers integer.
        Parameters:
        type - the type as a string
